entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5 except 8 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5 except 8 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 1 except minus 7 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 1 except minus 7 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5 except 8 inland.
